author: Robert Grayson
message:
test: add 72-test suite with safe rendering verification

Port 17 tokenizer tests, 22 parser tests from httpeex reference.
Add 33 integration tests including 15 safe-rendering-specific tests
(XSS prevention, structure preservation, escaping verification).

Fix secondary constructor field initialization (ListBuilder not
initialized when using class parameters + secondary constructor).
Fix untagged markdown code blocks being compiled by Temper.

Co-Authored-By: Claude Opus 4.6 <noreply@anthropic.com>

author: Robert Grayson
message:
feat: implement safe HEEx parser with SafeHtmlBuilder accumulator

Core modules (2,883 lines of Temper literate programming):
- safe_html.temper.md: SafeHtmlBuilder with append/appendSafe/accumulated
- ast.temper.md: AST node definitions (ported from httpeex)
- tokenizer.temper.md: Lexical analysis with 20+ token types (ported)
- parser.temper.md: Recursive descent parser (ported)
- renderer.temper.md: Safe renderer using SafeHtmlBuilder for HTML output
- config.temper.md: Package metadata for safe-heex
- exports.temper.md: Public API with SafeHtml tagged string export

Key change from httpeex: renderer uses SafeHtmlBuilder instead of
StringBuilder. Template structure goes through appendSafe() (trusted),
user content goes through append() (auto-escaped for XSS prevention).

Co-Authored-By: Claude Opus 4.6 <noreply@anthropic.com>

author: --replace-all
message:
docs: add knowledge cache, research docs, and read-only boundary rules

- CONTEXT.md: 748-line comprehensive reference for safe_httpeex implementation
- INFO.md: 277-line research cache with HEEx syntax, Temper patterns, architecture
- CLAUDE.md: added READ-ONLY boundary rule for ../httpeex and ../temper

Co-Authored-By: Claude Opus 4.6 <noreply@anthropic.com>
